FAQ / Wave 1 / Battle Cards /
View On FortressMaximus.io

New Designs

  1. If Optimus Prime - Battlefield Legend attacks in Bot Mode and you flip a New Designs, can it be used to put an upgrade on to one of my characters? Also is this the same if I flip a Brainstorm? [Source: WotC]
    Yes to both!
